en.title: [2024] Producer Price Index
en.description: Monthly producer prices broken down by MSIC section, division and group, as well as SITC section and stage of processing.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest monthly PPI data, with disaggregation by MSIC section, division and group, as well as SITC section and stage of processing.

bm.title: [2024] Indeks Harga Pengeluar
bm.description: Harga pengeluar bulanan mengikut seksyen, bahagian dan kumpulan MSIC, serta seksyen dan peringkat pemprosesan SITC.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data IHPR bulanan terkini, dengan pecahan mengikut seksyen, bahagian dan kumpulan MSIC, serta seksyen dan peringkat pemprosesan SITC.
